title: Publish current version

requirements.text: Build and publish the current application version without making additional functional changes.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build completes successfully with no build-time errors.
The newly published deployment loads successfully in the browser.
Existing functionality (including transaction deletion with confirmation dialog) remains available after publish.

constraints: Do not introduce new features or UI changes; publish the current state only.
nonGoals: Changing transaction deletion rules or permissions
Adding new backend data fields or migrations

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text in build requests.
